title: vw t5 coach built trading vehicle

posts.content:
for sale is a catering sales/trading vehicle, it has a sales flap in one side for serving coffee, ice cream, burgers, tickets etc... and a pedestrian door in the other. it is all built new with our own designed retro shaped body. this vehicle is being built at the moment and will be ready to kit out at the end of march. the inside will be a blank canvas for you to have kitted out for what ever business you have. there is also storage above the cab. the floor area is 1998mm wide and 3160mm long, there is also plenty of space underneath for water and gas tanks.

the base vehicle is a 2005 vw t5 chassis cab, 72,000 miles, we have had it serviced, cam belt and water pump,its also had a new clutch and flywheel fitted and new brake disc's and pads front and rear... etc.... so its good to go.. its mot'd. colour coded caravelle front bumper and sportline splitter, lowered, our own sourced correct load rated 8.5" x 18" wheels and new tyres . it has been professionally painted in porsche blue (as pictured ) and will have the same body at the turquoise vw in the pictures.
this vehicle weighs in at 2050kg so you have just under 1 tonne of payload for equipment and stock.







so if you want to start a new business or expand.... what better way to get your potential customers to your stand, than in the coolest looking catering vehicle on the site!!

nows the time to get ready for the 2016 season, and what better to get people to your stand than in this eye catching trader....

we have it on ebay £19,000 and if you are willing to have our logo's on the cab doors for a year (contracted) we an do it for £18,500

any questions call buzz on 07880948643
still available, will be at stanford hall and vanwest..
